results.title: Comparison of simvastatin gel and amnion membrane gel for preventing postoperative intra-abdominal adhesion formation in rat model.
results.text_hl: Comparison of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ gel and amnion membrane gel for preventing postoperative @<m>DISEASE_Internal_Hernia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000082122 @@@intra-abdominal adhesion@@@ formation in @SPECIES_10116 @@@rat@@@ model.

results.title: The role of simvastatin on postoperative peritoneal adhesion formation in an animal model.
results.text_hl: AIM: The aim of this study is to show the effect of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ on @<m>DISEASE_Internal_Hernia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000082122 @@@intra-abdominal adhesion formation@@@.

citations.NLM: Kucuk HF, Kaptanoglu L, Kurt N, Uzun H, Eser M, Bingul S, Torlak OA, Akyol H. The role of simvastatin on postoperative peritoneal adhesion formation in an animal model. Eur Surg Res. 2007;39(2):98-102. PMID: 17283433

results.title: Effect of orally administered simvastatin on prevention of postoperative adhesion in rats.
results.text_hl: RESULTS: As a result of the macroscopic evaluation of postoperative @<m>DISEASE_Internal_Hernia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000082122 @@@intra-abdominal adhesions@@@, the percentage of @DISEASE_Tissue_Adhesions @DISEASE_MESH:D000267 @@@adhesion@@@ in @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ applied group was found to be 0.8 +- 0.17.

citations.NLM: Yildiz MK, Okan I, Dursun N, Bas G, Alimoglu O, Kaya B, Odabasi M, Sahin M. Effect of orally administered simvastatin on prevention of postoperative adhesion in rats. Int J Clin Exp Med. 2014;7(2):405-10. PMID: 24600496
